## base64Decode() function

Stateful transducer. Decodes base64 chars into bytes. Supports URL safe &amp; unsafe flavors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function base64Decode(): Transducer<string, number>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<string, number>`
